title: Basic Website Structure
description: A concept map visualizing the typical components and pages of a basic website, including homepage, about us, services, and contact page.

title: Markdown Documentation Structure
description: Illustrates how a set of Markdown files can be organized for a technical documentation project, covering setup, usage, and API references.

title: Python Simple Game Logic
description: A concept map outlining the core logic for a simple text-based adventure game written in Python, including game loop, player actions, and state.
